title: Software Engineering Consultant
description: Coordinated DevOps initiatives to orchestrate the deployment of Docker services onto IoT devices with balenaCloud.
Pioneered the development of a NetworkManager library, boosting codebase readability and maintenance efficiency by 40%.
Engineered and rigorously unit-tested a robust industrial application in an AWS EC2 instance to enhance reliability by 40%.
Developed RESTful API endpoints and MQTT messaging, optimizing backend communication and data retrieval by 80%.
Architected on-device SQLite3 and cloud-based PostgreSQL schemas, significantly improving data storage and access times.
Integrated authentication infrastructure with secure user login, per-device SSL certificates, and JSON Web Tokens.

title: Software Engineer II Intern
description: Spearheaded a team of 4 within Financial Technologies for a continuous integration deployment to further data-driven solutions.
Transformed and analyzed user analytics data and metrics to provide insights about financial analysts' software habits.
Created a data extraction module from GCP, saving analysts 18,000 hours weekly by seamlessly recommending reports.
Deployed the model as a Docker container on a Kubernetes staging cluster via a GitHub CI/CD pipeline to serve an API endpoint.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Launched a PowerBI dashboard to leverage NLP and provide real-time insights, reducing decision-making time by 30%.
Assisted in company partner savings of $4 Million by delivering in-house solutions and decision-influencing data visualizations.
Developed a drone-based object detection system, slashing inspection costs by 50% and saving over $500,000 annually.
